EmailTemplate.name: SFDC Sandbox Refresh Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: ** NOTICE ** UTQA Sandbox Refresh Complete - 21 Apr 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TO: SFDC Corporate Org Administrators / Engagement Leaders
DuPont Utilities QA (UTQA) Sandbox refresh is complete, fully activated and ready for use.
What you need to do: You can log into the refreshed sandbox at URL: https://test.salesforce.com by appending the .sandbox_name to your production username. For example, if your username in production is user1.util@company.com then your username in sandbox named “UTQA” is user1.util@company.UTQA
Note: Remember to update and verify your email address as soon as you log in since it is also appended with ".utqa "
More Information: Sandbox Refresh Schedule featured in CRM Content Library in OneDuPont Org (subscribe to receive notification of updates): https://one-dupont.my.salesforce.com/sfc/#version?id=06830000000aAS5
